restrictions.sqlQuery: select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_First')
select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_First')

select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_First') and (status_for_button_show in (select recid from statuses_groups where recname = 'Новое') or executor = '@activeUser.recid')

select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_First') and (status_for_button_show in (select recid from statuses_groups where recname = 'Новое') or executor = '@activeUser.recid')
select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_Reissuance')
select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_Reissuance')

select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_Reissuance') and (status_for_button_show in (select recid from statuses_groups where recname = 'Новое') or executor = '@activeUser.recid')

select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_Reissuance') and (status_for_button_show in (select recid from statuses_groups where recname = 'Новое') or executor = '@activeUser.recid')
select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_Dublicate')
select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_Dublicate')

select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_Dublicate') and (status_for_button_show in (select recid from statuses_groups where recname = 'Новое') or executor = '@activeUser.recid')

select * from service_applications where service_name in (select recid from services_names where reccode = 'OrdersEpguTemplateUniversalProcess.44_Lic_Lom_Dublicate') and (status_for_button_show in (select recid from statuses_groups where recname = 'Новое') or executor = '@activeUser.recid')

types.name: service_applications_application_status_calculated
types.formula: select recname from statuses_groups where statuses_groups.recid = service_applications.status_for_button_show

types.name: service_applications_application_name_type_calculated
types.formula: select reccode from services_names where services_names.recid = service_applications.service_name

types.name: gateway_pending_requests_application_id
types.displayName: Идентификатор заявления, по которому отправлен запрос

types.name: interagency_interaction_channels_requests_response_file
types.displayName: Документы, полученные по каналам межведомственного взаимодействия

types.name: service_applications_taxi_license_numbers
types.formula: select  string_agg(permission_register_taxi.registration_number, ', ') from permission_register_taxi left join application_permission_register_taxi on permission_register_taxi.recid = application_permission_register_taxi.permission where application_permission_register_taxi.application = service_applications.recid

types.name: service_applications_taxi_license_number
types.formula: select registration_number from permission_register_taxi prt where recid = (select permission from application_permission_register_taxi aprt where application = service_applications.recid order by reccreated desc limit 1)

types.name: service_applications_license_status_relation_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT license_statuses.recname FROM license_register AS lr LEFT JOIN license_statuses ON license_statuses.recid = lr.status WHERE lr.recid = service_applications.license_number_relation)

types.name: service_applications_alcohol_license_status_relation_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT license_statuses.recname FROM license_register_alcohol AS lra LEFT JOIN license_statuses ON license_statuses.recid = lra.license_action_info WHERE lra.recid = service_applications.alcohol_license_number_relation)

types.name: service_applications_taxi_license_status_relation_calculated
types.formula: select license_statuses.recname FROM permission_register_taxi as prt LEFT JOIN license_statuses ON license_statuses.recid = prt.status WHERE prt.recid = (select permission from application_permission_register_taxi where application = service_applications.recid order by reccreated desc limit 1)

types.name: service_applications_mkd_license_status_relation_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT license_statuses.recname FROM mkd_license_register AS mlg LEFT JOIN license_statuses ON license_statuses.recid = mlg.license_status WHERE mlg.recid = service_applications.mkd_license_number_relation)

types.name: service_applications_licensee_relation_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT lr.licensee_name FROM license_register AS lr WHERE lr.recid = service_applications.license_number_relation)

types.name: service_applications_alcohol_licensee_relation_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT lra.organization_name FROM license_register_alcohol AS lra WHERE lra.recid = service_applications.alcohol_license_number_relation)

types.name: service_applications_taxi_licensee_relation_calculated
types.formula: select name from permission_register_taxi prt where recid = (select permission from application_permission_register_taxi aprt where application = service_applications.recid order by reccreated desc limit 1)

types.name: service_applications_mkd_licensee_relation_calculated
types.formula: (SELECT mlg.licensee_name FROM mkd_license_register AS mlg WHERE mlg.recid = service_applications.mkd_license_number_relation)

types.formula: select concat(lastname, ' ', firstname, ' ', patronymic) from rdev___auth_users where internal_documents_orders.author = rdev___auth_users.recid

types.name: interagency_interaction_channels_requests_request_initiator_fio
types.formula: select concat(lastname, ' ', firstname, ' ', patronymic) from rdev___auth_users where interagency_interaction_channels_requests.request_initiator = rdev___auth_users.recid

types.formula: select count(*) from mkd_under_manager as mum where mum.license_number = mkd_license_register.recid

types.formula: select recname from services_names where services_names.recid = service_applications.service_name

types.name: users_login
types.formula: select login from rdev___auth_users where rdev___auth_users.recid = application_users.rdev_user

types.name: users_lastname
types.formula: select lastname from rdev___auth_users where rdev___auth_users.recid = application_users.rdev_user

types.formula: select email from rdev___auth_users where rdev___auth_users.recid = application_users.rdev_user

types.formula: select concat(lastname, ' ', firstname, ' ', patronymic) from rdev___auth_users where mkd_license_change_history.author_of_changes = rdev___auth_users.recid

types.name: mkd_license_register_author_fio
types.formula: select concat(lastname, ' ', firstname, ' ', patronymic) from rdev___auth_users where mkd_license_register.issuer = rdev___auth_users.recid

types.name: accrual_creation_status_calculated_type
types.formula: select recname from accrual_creation_status where payment_list.accrual_creation_status = accrual_creation_status.recid
